example.eg: The young executive's enterprise in taking charge of the difficult project impressed the boss.
example.egtrans: 那位年轻的执行官颇有进取心，负责一个十分困难的项目，让老板印象深刻。

example.eg: Many business owners spend years trying to get their enterprises started.
example.egtrans: 许多商人都是花了多年时间才让自己的企业起飞。

example.eg: The group's attempt to climb Everest was a daring enterprise.
example.egtrans: 小组拥有一个大胆的冒险计划，想要攀登珠峰。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 具有挑战性的计划, 冒险计划

example.eg: The G8 is a group of nations who share a belief in free enterprise as the best route to growth.
